channel.title: [PHP]Simplify?
channel.description:
Could someone simplify my codes for comparing? Everything is probably all bad and wrong. All I know is that it works, but it takes longer to load than runescapes. [code=php]function personalPlayer($name) { include "mysql.php"; //$xptype = findType($i)."xp"; $lvltype = findType($type)."lvl"; $skill = findType($type); $query = mysql_query("SELECT * FROM skills WHERE playerName LIKE '".fixName($name)."' LIMIT 1") or die(mysql_error()); $row = mysql_fetch_array($query); $overall["lvl"] = getLevelForXP($row["Attackxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Defencexp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Strengthxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Constitutionxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Rangexp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Prayerxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Magicxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Cookingxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Woodcuttingxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Fletchingxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Fishingxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Firemakingxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Craftingxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Smithingxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Miningxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Herblorexp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Agilityxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Thievingxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Slayerxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Farmingxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Runecraftxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Conqueringxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Constructionxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Summoningxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Hunterxp"]); $overall["xp"] = $row["Attackxp"] + $row["Defencexp"] + $row["Strengthxp"] + $row["Constitutionxp"] + $row["Rangexp"] + $row["Prayerxp"] + $row["Magicxp"] + $row["Cookingxp"] + $row["Woodcuttingxp"] + $row["Fletchingxp"] + $row["Fishingxp"] + $row["Firemakingxp"] + $row["Craftingxp"] + $row["Smithingxp"] + $row["Miningxp"] + $row["Herblorexp"] + $row["Agilityxp"] + $row["Thievingxp"] + $row["Slayerxp"] + $row["Farmingxp"] + $row["Runecraftxp"] + $row["Conqueringxp"] + $row["Constructionxp"] + $row["Summoningxp"] + $row["Hunterxp"]; echo' '; //overall echo '
Overall '.findRank($_GET["user"],"0").' '.dots($overall["lvl"]).' '.dots($overall["xp"]).' '; echo'
'; //Test for ($i = 1; $i <=25; $i++){ $xptype = findType($i)."xp"; if(getLevelForXP($row["$xptype"],"$i") > 29){ echo'
'.findType($i).' '.findRank($_GET["user"],"$i").' '.getLevelForXP($row["$xptype"],"$i").' '.dots($row["$xptype"],"$i").' ';} else if(getLevelForXP($row["$xptype"],"$i") < 30){ echo '
'.findType($i).' Not Ranked ';} echo'
'; }} function comparePlayers($name, $name2) { include "mysql.php"; //$xptype = findType($i)."xp"; $lvltype = findType($type)."lvl"; $skill = findType($type); $query = mysql_query("SELECT * FROM skills WHERE playerName LIKE '".fixName($name)."' LIMIT 1") or die(mysql_error()); $query2 = mysql_query("SELECT * FROM skills WHERE playerName LIKE '".fixName($name2)."' LIMIT 1") or die(mysql_error()); $row = mysql_fetch_array($query); $overall["lvl"] = getLevelForXP($row["Attackxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Defencexp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Strengthxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Constitutionxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Rangexp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Prayerxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Magicxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Cookingxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Woodcuttingxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Fletchingxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Fishingxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Firemakingxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Craftingxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Smithingxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Miningxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Herblorexp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Agilityxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Thievingxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Slayerxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Farmingxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Runecraftxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Conqueringxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Constructionxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Summoningxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Hunterxp"]); $overall["xp"] = $row["Attackxp"] + $row["Defencexp"] + $row["Strengthxp"] + $row["Constitutionxp"] + $row["Rangexp"] + $row["Prayerxp"] + $row["Magicxp"] + $row["Cookingxp"] + $row["Woodcuttingxp"] + $row["Fletchingxp"] + $row["Fishingxp"] + $row["Firemakingxp"] + $row["Craftingxp"] + $row["Smithingxp"] + $row["Miningxp"] + $row["Herblorexp"] + $row["Agilityxp"] + $row["Thievingxp"] + $row["Slayerxp"] + $row["Farmingxp"] + $row["Runecraftxp"] + $row["Conqueringxp"] + $row["Constructionxp"] + $row["Summoningxp"] + $row["Hunterxp"]; $row2 = mysql_fetch_array($query2); $overall["lvls"] = getLevelForXP($row2["Attackxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row2["Defencexp"]) + getLevelForXP($row2["Strengthxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row2["Constitutionxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row2["Rangexp"]) + getLevelForXP($row2["Prayerxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row2["Magicxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row2["Cookingxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row2["Woodcuttingxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row2["Fletchingxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row2["Fishingxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row2["Firemakingxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row2["Craftingxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row2["Smithingxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row2["Miningxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row2["Herblorexp"]) + getLevelForXP($row2["Agilityxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row2["Thievingxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row2["Slayerxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row2["Farmingxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row2["Runecraftxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row2["Conqueringxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row2["Constructionxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row2["Summoningxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row2["Hunterxp"]); $overall["xps"] = $row2["Attackxp"] + $row2["Defencexp"] + $row2["Strengthxp"] + $row2["Constitutionxp"] + $row2["Rangexp"] + $row2["Prayerxp"] + $row2["Magicxp"] + $row2["Cookingxp"] + $row2["Woodcuttingxp"] + $row2["Fletchingxp"] + $row2["Fishingxp"] + $row2["Firemakingxp"] + $row2["Craftingxp"] + $row2["Smithingxp"] + $row2["Miningxp"] + $row2["Herblorexp"] + $row2["Agilityxp"] + $row2["Thievingxp"] + $row2["Slayerxp"] + $row2["Farmingxp"] + $row2["Runecraftxp"] + $row2["Conqueringxp"] + $row2["Constructionxp"] + $row2["Summoningxp"] + $row2["Hunterxp"]; echo' '; //overall echo '
Overall '.findRank($_GET["user"],"0").' '.dots($overall["lvl"]).' '.dots($overall["xp"]).' ';if(($overall["lvl"]) > ($overall["lvls"])){ echo' ';} else if(($overall["lvl"]) < ($overall["lvls"])){ echo' ';} else if(($overall["lvl"]) == ($overall["lvls"]) && ($overall["xp"]) > ($overall["xps"])){ echo ' ';} else if(($overall["lvl"]) == ($overall["lvls"]) && ($overall["xp"]) < ($overall["xps"])){ echo ' ';} echo' '.findRank($_GET["user2"],"0").' '.dots($overall["lvls"]).' '.dots($overall["xps"]).' ';if(($overall["lvls"]) > ($overall["lvl"])){ echo' ';} else if(($overall["lvls"]) < ($overall["lvl"])){ echo' ';} else if(($overall["lvls"]) == ($overall["lvl"]) && ($overall["xps"]) > ($overall["xp"])){ echo ' ';} else if(($overall["lvls"]) == ($overall["lvl"]) && ($overall["xps"]) < ($overall["xp"])){ echo ' ';} echo' '.findRank($_GET["user2"],"0").' '.dots($overall["lvls"]).' '.dots($overall["xps"]).' '; if(($overall["lvl"]) > ($overall["lvls"])){ echo'
';} else if(($overall["lvl"]) < ($overall["lvls"])){ echo'
';} else if(($overall["lvl"]) == ($overall["lvls"]) && ($overall["xp"]) > ($overall["xps"])){ echo ' ';} //Test for ($i = 1; $i <=25; $i++){ $xptype = findType($i)."xp"; if(getLevelForXP($row["$xptype"],"$i") > 29){ echo'
'.findType($i).' '.findRank($_GET["user"],"$i").' '.getLevelForXP($row["$xptype"],"$i").' '.dots($row["$xptype"],"$i").' ';if(($row["$xptype"]) > ($row2["$xptype"])){ echo' ';} else if(($row["$xptype"]) < ($row2["$xptype"])){ echo' ';} else if(($row2["$xptype"]) == ($row["$xptype"])){ echo' '; }} else if(getLevelForXP($row["$xptype"],"$i") < 30){ echo '
'.findType($i).' Not Ranked ';} if(getLevelForXP($row2["$xptype"],"$i") > 29){ echo' '.findRank($_GET["user2"],"$i").' '.getLevelForXP($row2["$xptype"]).' '.dots($row2["$xptype"]).' ';if(($row2["$xptype"]) > ($row["$xptype"])){ echo'
';} else if(($row2["$xptype"]) < ($row["$xptype"])){ echo'
';} else if(($row2["$xptype"]) == ($row["$xptype"])){ echo' ';}} if(getLevelForXP($row2["$xptype"],"$i") < 30){ echo ' Not Ranked ';}} }[/code]

item.title: [PHP]Simplify?
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

It may be quick with a small database but it will get slower and slower as the database gets bigger. My old highscores used to take 2 seconds to load when I had 70,000 registered characters.

I understand you. I’m going to try and make the character thing like yours, I like that. I already have the table, but now I need the images. O.O

Read full topic

item.title: [PHP]Simplify?
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

Honestly the code sucks and it’s silly having to wait 4-8 seconds for the page to load. You should instead use cached highscores. My highscores have more features than yours and load in under 100ms. It’s the way to go.

Mine load under 100ms too, just not the comparing function. http://sshiscores.info/hiscores/compare.php?user=Psyho&user2=Hainoob
Also, mine auto-update, as you gain exp, the hiscores update.

Another thing, how the hell do I make a search rank? I know I suck, but I’m getting there, sort of. function ranking($rank){ $xptype = findType($_GET['type'])."xp"; $rank = 0; $name = $_GET['name']; $query_result = mysql_query("SELECT * FROM skills WHERE playerName LIKE '".fixName($name)."' LIMIT 1 SET $rank = $num := $num +1 WHERE $xptype > 0 ORDER BY $xptype DESC"); $num = 0; echo "$rank"; }

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

Could someone simplify my codes for comparing?
Everything is probably all bad and wrong. All I know is that it works, but it takes longer to load than runescapes.

[code=php]function personalPlayer($name) {
include “mysql.php”;
//$xptype = findType($i).“xp”;
$lvltype = findType($type).“lvl”;
$skill = findType($type);
$query = mysql_query(“SELECT * FROM skills WHERE playerName LIKE '”.fixName($name)."’ LIMIT 1") or die(mysql_error());
$row = mysql_fetch_array($query);
$overall[“lvl”] = getLevelForXP($row[“Attackxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Defencexp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Strengthxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Constitutionxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Rangexp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Prayerxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Magicxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Cookingxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Woodcuttingxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Fletchingxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Fishingxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Firemakingxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Craftingxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Smithingxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Miningxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Herblorexp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Agilityxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Thievingxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Slayerxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Farmingxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Runecraftxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Conqueringxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Constructionxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Summoningxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Hunterxp”]);
$overall[“xp”] = $row[“Attackxp”] + $row[“Defencexp”] + $row[“Strengthxp”] + $row[“Constitutionxp”] + $row[“Rangexp”] + $row[“Prayerxp”] + $row[“Magicxp”] + $row[“Cookingxp”] + $row[“Woodcuttingxp”] + $row[“Fletchingxp”] + $row[“Fishingxp”] + $row[“Firemakingxp”] + $row[“Craftingxp”] + $row[“Smithingxp”] + $row[“Miningxp”] + $row[“Herblorexp”] + $row[“Agilityxp”] + $row[“Thievingxp”] + $row[“Slayerxp”] + $row[“Farmingxp”] + $row[“Runecraftxp”] + $row[“Conqueringxp”] + $row[“Constructionxp”] + $row[“Summoningxp”] + $row[“Hunterxp”];
echo’ '; //overall echo '

Overall '.findRank($_GET["user"],"0").' '.dots($overall["lvl"]).' '.dots($overall["xp"]).' '; echo'
'; //Test for ($i = 1; $i <=25; $i++){ $xptype = findType($i)."xp"; if(getLevelForXP($row["$xptype"],"$i") > 29){ echo'
'.findType($i).' '.findRank($_GET["user"],"$i").' '.getLevelForXP($row["$xptype"],"$i").' '.dots($row["$xptype"],"$i").' ';} else if(getLevelForXP($row["$xptype"],"$i") < 30){ echo '
'.findType($i).' Not Ranked ';} echo'

LIMIT 1") or die(mysql_error()); $query2 = mysql_query("SELECT * FROM skills WHERE playerName LIKE '".fixName($name2)."' LIMIT 1") or die(mysql_error()); $row = mysql_fetch_array($query); $overall["lvl"] = getLevelForXP($row["Attackxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Defencexp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Strengthxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Constitutionxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Rangexp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Prayerxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Magicxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Cookingxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Woodcuttingxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Fletchingxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Fishingxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Firemakingxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Craftingxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Smithingxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Miningxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Herblorexp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Agilityxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Thievingxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Slayerxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Farmingxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Runecraftxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Conqueringxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Constructionxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Summoningxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Hunterxp"]); $overall["xp"] = $row["Attackxp"] + $row["Defencexp"] + $row["Strengthxp"] + $row["Constitutionxp"] + $row["Rangexp"] + $row["Prayerxp"] + $row["Magicxp"] + $row["Cookingxp"] + $row["Woodcuttingxp"] + $row["Fletchingxp"] + $row["Fishingxp"] + $row["Firemakingxp"] + $row["Craftingxp"] + $row["Smithingxp"] + $row["Miningxp"] + $row["Herblorexp"] + $row["Agilityxp"] + $row["Thievingxp"] + $row["Slayerxp"] + $row["Farmingxp"] + $row["Runecraftxp"] + $row["Conqueringxp"] + $row["Constructionxp"] + $row["Summoningxp"] + $row["Hunterxp"]; echo' '; //overall 
echo '

';if(($overall["lvl"]) > ($overall["lvls"])){ echo' ';} else if(($overall["lvl"]) < ($overall["lvls"])){ echo' ';} else if(($overall["lvl"]) == ($overall["lvls"]) && ($overall["xp"]) > ($overall["xps"])){ echo '
